name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its classic box-shaped soldier design, RetroBot exudes a nostalgic charm. Its retro console buttons and classic arms and legs add to its vintage appeal. Despite its broken screen, RetroBot remains a formidable member of the club, utilizing its unique abilities and skills to contribute to the team's success. With a blend of charisma, constitution, dexterity, intelligence, strength, and wisdom, RetroBot is a well-rounded companion. Its alignment reflects its dedication to justice and fairness, always fighting for what is right.
